skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: 92Bilal26

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and design guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or external command execution. Safe for publication.

content.value_statement: Building web interfaces often results in generic, predictable designs. This skill guides AI assistants to create bold, production-grade frontend code with distinctive aesthetics, creative typography, and polished animations that stand out from standard patterns.
actual_capabilities: Guides creation of distinctive web components with bold aesthetics
Provides design thinking methodology before coding
Recommends typography, color schemes, and animation approaches
Avoids generic AI-generated aesthetics and overused patterns
Creates cohesive designs with clear visual identity
limitations: Does not execute code or access local files
Does not install dependencies or run build commands
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Focus is on guidance and code generation, not live design

use_cases.title: Create memorable web components
use_cases.description: Build production-ready React, Vue, or HTML/CSS components with distinctive visual identity and polished animations.

use_cases.title: Prototype bold interfaces
use_cases.description: Translate design concepts into working code with attention to typography, motion, and spatial composition details.

use_cases.title: Build aesthetic landing pages
use_cases.description: Generate complete frontend pages with creative layouts, custom cursors, and atmospheric visual effects.

prompt_templates.title: Basic component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a distinctive [component type] for a [context] using [framework]. Focus on [specific aesthetic goal] with bold typography and cohesive color scheme.

prompt_templates.title: Animated section
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an animated hero section with staggered reveals, scroll-triggering effects, and atmospheric background using [technique].

prompt_templates.title: Full page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a complete landing page with [aesthetic theme] direction. Include header, features section, and footer with consistent typography and motion design.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a [dashboard/widget] component with interactive states, micro-animations, and data visualization elements that follow [specific aesthetic] design language.

output_examples.input: Create a distinctive pricing card component for a SaaS product
output: PricingCard component with bold typography using Space Grotesk display font and Inter body font
Color scheme: deep charcoal background with electric lime accents and subtle grain overlay
Hover animation: card lifts with glowing border and price counter animation
CSS-only animations using keyframes with staggered reveal for feature list
Mobile-responsive layout with touch-friendly tap targets

best_practices: Commit to a bold aesthetic direction before coding rather than defaulting to safe choices
Use CSS variables for consistent theming and easier dark mode support
Prioritize high-impact motion moments like page load reveals over scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using generic system fonts or overused choices like Inter and Roboto
Applying purple gradients on white backgrounds as default styling
Building predictable layouts without spatial composition or visual hierarchy

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: React, Vue, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and other modern frontend frameworks based on user requirements.

faq.question: What level of design complexity can it handle?
faq.answer: From simple components to complete pages with complex animations, layouts, and interactive states.

faq.question: Does it integrate with design tools?
faq.answer: The skill generates code based on design principles. It does not directly integrate with Figma or Sketch.

faq.question: Is user data handled securely?
faq.answer: This skill only generates code and design guidance. It does not access, store, or transmit user data.

faq.question: Why do my designs look generic?
faq.answer: The skill specifically targets avoiding generic AI aesthetics by enforcing bold choices, unique typography, and creative color palettes.

faq.question: How is this different from standard code generation?
faq.answer: It focuses on design intentionality, creative direction, and production-quality aesthetics rather than functional code only.
